title: Flipped Learning-Based Engineering Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories of engineering education and basic instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen instructional design competencies by applying flipped learning to engineering education.

learning_goals: An instructional design framework for applying the flipped learning model to engineering education can be developed
Data-driven learning design strategies for analyzing learner engagement can be conceptualized
Pre/post-learning activities utilizing mobile-optimized microlearning content can be designed
A system for monitoring learner understanding and providing feedback using formative assessment tools can be proposed

resources: Digital Content Repository for Engineering Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
